item.title: MySQL DBA - Seattle, WA (downtown / civic / van ness)
item.description:
An established Seattle based company is enjoying manageable growth and looking for an Operational/Functionall MySQL DBA to be instrumental in implementing new systems/platforms, maintaining/troubleshooting their databases, and also to assist in completing a recent major data migration.

Location: Seattle, WA
Contract to Hire opportunity

Excellent communication and customer service/support skills are essential here.

The ability to be on call rotation 24/7 is necessary and part of the opportunity.

Skills and Qualifications:
- Excellent collaborative and team skills
- 2 years of Linux administration experience (Red Hat)
- 4 years of MySQL admin. experience working on multi-server production systems
- Excellent communication and presentation skills
- Experience in clustered or distributed environments
- Strong attention to detail
- Experience in database migrations
- Experience w/ MySQL replication
- Experience in new database implementations

- 4 year degree in Computer Science or related field; or equivalent experience (4 additional yrs to the other experience req's listed)

- CMA and/or CMDBA certifications highly desired

If you meet the above qualifications, please send your resume in word/pdf format to:

ryan.prosio@greythorninc.com
item.dc:title: MySQL DBA - Seattle, WA (downtown / civic / van ness)
